Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, with faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior identifying the contents as year 12 wine from the western river.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 59
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393168) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393168)
